p: The specimen from the CHIKV and DENV-2 co-infection was obtained on June 11, 2014. The DENV-2 isolate was closely related to a previously reported strain isolated in early 2016 (KX702404) from a US traveler returning from Haiti [ 39] and they both cluster within a well-supported clade including Brazilian and Peruvian subclades (Figs 3C and S3C). According to the time-scaled phylogeny ( Fig 3C), the tMRCA of the DENV-2 isolate from the CHIKV co-infected patient traced back to February 2008 with 95%HPD between May 2007 and October 2008.
